snippet: The warning, by Iran’s army chief, was the latest and most aggressive volley in a near-daily exchange of barbed statements between Iran and the United States.
abstract: Iran's military chief Maj Gen Ataollah Salehi warns that American aircraft carrier that left the Persian Gulf through the strategic Strait of Hormuz should not return; warning comes amid repeated threats by Iran that it will close the passage if Western powers move forward with new sanctions on its oil exports, and is latest escalation of barbed statements that have been exchanged on an almost daily basis between Iran and the United States.
lead_paragraph: The warning, by Iran’s army chief, was the latest and most aggressive volley in a near-daily exchange of barbed statements between Iran and the United States.

headline.seo: Iran Warns U.S. Aircraft Carrier Not to Return to the Gulf
headline.main: Iran Warns U.S. Aircraft Carrier Not to Return to Gulf
headline.print_headline: Iran Warns U.S. Aircraft Carrier Not to Return to Gulf and a Strategic Strait

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
